Themes, styling, CSS

Create a new theme, set primary color

Custom theme

// MainLayour.razor

// Add new theme
private readonly MudTheme _myTheme = new()
{
    PaletteLight = new()
    {
        Primary = new MudColor(20, 180, 230, 255),
        AppbarBackground = new MudColor(20, 180, 230, 255)
    }
};

// Set theme on provider
<MudThemeProvider Theme="@_myTheme"/>

// Test it out!
<MudButton Variant="Filled">Hello .NET Zuid!</MudButton>

Dark theme

<MudThemeProvider IsDarkMode="true"/>

User preference theme

<MudThemeProvider @ref="_mudThemeProvider" Theme="_myTheme" @bind-IsDarkMode="_isDarkMode"/>

private bool _isDarkMode;
private MudThemeProvider _mudThemeProvider;

protected override async Task OnAfterRenderAsync(bool firstRender)
{
    if (firstRender)
    {
        _isDarkMode = await _mudThemeProvider.GetSystemDarkModeAsync();
        StateHasChanged();
    }
}

Color, Variant, Severity

<MudButton>What's up .NET zuid!</MudButton>
<MudButton Variant="Variant.Filled">What's up .NET zuid!</MudButton>

<MudButton Variant="Variant.Filled" Color="Color.Error">What's up .NET zuid!</MudButton>
<MudButton Variant="Variant.Filled" Color="Color.Success">What's up .NET zuid!</MudButton>

<MudAlert Severity="Severity.Normal">Normal</MudAlert>
<MudAlert Severity="Severity.Info">Info</MudAlert>
<MudAlert Severity="Severity.Success" Variant="Variant.Filled">Success</MudAlert>
<MudAlert Severity="Severity.Error" Variant="Variant.Outlined">Error</MudAlert>

CSS/Flexbox classes

Margin/padding

ma-4 -> margin ALL 4
my-4 -> margin Y-axis 4
mx-4 -> margin X-axis 4
mt-4, mr-4, mb-4, ml-4 -> margin top|right|bottom|left

pa, px, py, pt, pr, pb, pl -> padding all|x|y||top|right|bottom|left

d-flex
flex-column
flex-row
flex-grow-1

align-items-center
align-content-center
gap-0 -> gap-7
